EmailTemplate.subject: Smart Fuel Management & Savings at Sunoco
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Sunoco Fleet Program: Smarter than a Credit Card, Safer than Cash. And savings on every gallon at Sunoco.
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Whether you have one vehicle or 1,000, take charge of your fueling expenses with the Sunoco Fleet Program.
A Sunoco commercial fuel card is the perfect way to simplify your vehicle fueling and eliminate hours of paperwork.
CONTROL WHAT YOU SPEND. Better security and controls -- like guardrails on your fuel spend.
SEE WHAT YOU SPEND. The reporting you need, when you need it.
MANAGE WHAT YOU SPEND. Simple online & mobile account management.
SAVE WHEN YOU SPEND. Save on every gallon at Sunoco.
All backed by Sunoco-quality fuels and the confidence of having a local business relationship with your neighborhood Sunoco.
The Sunoco Fleet Program will deliver smart fuel management and savings for your company. Don't wait any longer, act today.
As incentive for your strong consideration, Sunoco is offering 25¢ off per gallon for the first 60 days followed by our competitive monthly fuel rebate of up to 6¢ off per gallon purchased at Sunoco.
You can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone: {!User.Phone} Email: {!User.Email}
*For new accounts only, subject to credit approval. Save 25-cents per gallon at Sunoco-branded locations for the first sixty (60) days. The promotional rebate applies to all fuel purchased at Sunoco-branded locations. Promotional period begins the date account is opened. Fuel savings will appear as an account credit on your monthly billing statement. When the promotional period ends, standard monthly program rebates will apply. Rebates are subject to change at any time without prior notice.
